name: Swap (itch) (JTG)
description:
"Control either Blue or Red and help to reach them to goal!" 

Swap is a platformer game that you can switch 2 players and switch toggles. Make them both reach the goal to win! Try finding out how to finish each level.

Fact is Swap is a fanmade version of  Heart Star, made in the app called Fancade. Actually inspired from that game. 

Note: This game is really buggy, sorry.. 

Hope you like it and have fun! :> -JoshuaTNTGamer
